Name: The National Institute of Mental Health Research Volunteer Dataset
Acknowledgements: Special thanks to the staff in the NIMH office of the Clinical Data for providing support for the data collection.  This work utilized the computational resources of the NIH HPC Biowulf cluster http://hpc.nih.gov.  We thank Sil van der Woerd for graciously allowing us to use his film as a behavioral task.  In addition, we thank the subjects who generously contributed their data to this project.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite this paper: The National Institute of Mental Health Research Volunteer Dataset: A comprehensive MRI, MEG, and behavioral resource
